Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory285.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "A horde of Corrupted has gathered in this area, but there aren't that many virtual projections appearing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Do we not have enough data?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's time-consuming to extract data from active Corrupted, not to mention the sheer number of them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Then we'll just have to clear out a portion of them.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia points to a group of rampant Corrupted in front of her.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'These Corrupted are blocking the street. Looks like we have no choice but to fight if we want to keep going.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Everyone, prepare for battle.', 3: '23'}
{3: 'Lucia grabs her weapon and takes a step forward, but Liv looks nervously toward the northeastern side of Old Street.'}
{2: "Liv? What's going on?", 3: '26'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'After we pass through Old Street... Are we going to the Business District?', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's right.", 3: '29'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I just detected a high concentration of the Punishing Virus there, but now it's gone...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is it moving? Or is something concealing their signal?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'While everyone deliberates over the issue, you receive a message from Bridget.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Hey, we just got attacked by Corrupted. They destroyed a security terminal here. Are you all okay?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Suddenly, the virtual spacial data in your line of sight begins to fluctuate violently before disappearing.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Looks like our nearest security terminal was also attacked!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's set one up here.", 3: '47'}
{3: 'You take the cube out of your backpack and hand it to Lee, who begins setting it up hastily.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Rrarrgghhhâ€”', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We've been spotted by the patrolling Corrupted, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ready your weapons!', 3: '54'}
